resources.string: How would you like to manage your apps?
Open Apps with usage access settings
Failed to retrieve app usage statistics. You may need to enable access for this app through Settings > Security > Apps with usage access
Please add AppManager to Apps with Usage Access in Settings / Security
You will be Navigated to Background Running Services in Device Settings
AppManager app and Logo are the trademarks of SoftClouds LLC All rights reserved
You will be Navigated to Battery Usage Details in Device Settings
No Apps Meet the Requirements for this List
The apps in this list are ones that contain ads. If you prefer apps that do not contain ads, click the red minus to delete the application

The apps in this list all have access to permission that collect your personal data. Click the info button next each app to see exactly which permissions are being used. If you prefer an app does not collect the specified permissions, click the red minus to delete the application
Choose an option on the dropdown menu to show all apps under that category. If you prefer not to have apps under that category, click the red minus to delete the application

Choose an option on the dropdown menu to show all apps that have not been used in that time frame. Displayed under the app name is that last time used. If you find that you are not using this app anymore, click the red minus to delete the application

The apps in this list are considered blacklisted due to known security concerns. If you prefer not to have these industry blacklisted apps on your device, click the the red minus to delete the application
